summary: Computer Engineering graduate student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics with hands-on experience in developing neural networks, machine learning models, and computer vision applications. Combining technical expertise with creative problem-solving abilities honed through diverse experiences at the Apple Developer Academy and competitive hackathons. Seeking to leverage my expertise in AI/ML technologies to contribute to innovative solutions in a challenging AI Engineer role.

education.description: The Apple Developer Academy is an intense and highly selective training program offered by Apple.

awards: Winner of a Scholarship for Outstanding Candidates

experience.description: Research experience working under the direct supervision of Inria.
experience.project: Organoids Image Classification using Vision Transformers.

experience.description: Research experience working under the direct supervision of PoliTo.
experience.project: Trained Deep Learning Models for Keyword Spotting and optimization.

achievements.title: Student Tech Clash 2025
achievements.description: Winner Student Tech Clash - Reply x Politecnico di Torino. The Idea Generation Event for University Students about AI Agents is coming to University of Manchester, Politecnico di Torino, Centrale Supelec (DSVH), RWTH Aachen, Politecnico di Milano, Bocconi and Sapienza.

achievements.title: The Big Hack 2023
achievements.description: Winner of 'STMicroelectronics – OneStepAhead: Il tuo coach personale per il benessere!' Hackathon provided by Regione Campania, Maker Faire Rome - The European Edition con Sviluppo Campania, Università degli studi di Napoli 'Federico II' and Apple Developer Academy.

achievements.title: B-Future Challenge
achievements.description: Hackathon provided by BOOM Knowledge Hub by CRIF, Regione Emilia-Romagna.

projects.name: Organoid Image Classification Using Deep Learning
projects.description: A comprehensive deep learning framework for 3D medical image classification of organoids using state-of-the-art transformer and CNN architectures.

projects.name: PolitoSbobinatore
projects.description: An AI model chain designed to simplify note taking at university by automating transcription and organization processes

projects.name: Real-Time Domain Adaptation for Semantic Segmentation
projects.description: Investigated domain adaptation techniques for semantic segmentation using state-of-the-art models like DeepLabv3, PIDNet, and MSNet on the LostAndFound dataset. Explored methods such as data augmentation, adversarial learning, DACS, PEM, and CycleGAN to tackle domain shifts between urban and rural environments

projects.name: Model Depth Conversion for Autonomous Vehicles
projects.description: Developed a model to convert depth heatmaps to depth values in meters for MAN TruckScenes dataset. Implements processing pipeline for autonomous vehicle perception systems

projects.name: Nostos: Excursion Navigation Application
projects.description: An application designed to help excursionists get back to their starting point when lost during hiking or outdoor sessions. Implements navigation algorithms to compute optimal return routes

projects.name: Context-Aware GUI Testing for Mobile Applications using LLMs
projects.description: Developed a framework leveraging Large Language Models for intelligent GUI testing of mobile applications. Utilizes context awareness to improve test case generation and automated testing of user interfaces

projects.name: Junky Storm
projects.description: This is an Arcade Game created by the UBG team. Starting with Gubby that wants to give back to humans all the food that aliens stoled from the Earth, but unfortunately he doesn't like bananas.. and aliens know it.

projects.name: Semi-Supervised Learning for Mesothelioma Classification
projects.description: Implemented semi-supervised learning techniques for mesothelioma disease classification using medical imaging data. Addresses the challenge of limited labeled data in medical diagnosis through advanced machine learning methodologies

softSkills.description: Strong capabilities in diverse, international teams
Bridges cultural and technical differences effectively
Creative solutions under pressure and tight deadlines
Resilient in dynamic environments, continuous learner

hobbies.description: Professional experience as a ballet dancer and entertainer. Trained in various dance styles with performances at cultural events and competitions.
Passionate Formula 1 and motorsport enthusiast with deep knowledge of racing technologies and strategies.
Background as an event animator and professional fire performer, demonstrating creativity and ability to perform under pressure.
Cooking Italian cuisine, crochet crafting, football, and tennis. These activities have developed my patience, precision, and teamwork abilities.
